summary:
Ever wished you could use the Unrelenting Force shout as a normal spell?
Well wish no more as I have made it into a friendly spell!
descriptionHtml:
[u][i][b][size=10]UNRELENTING FORCE PALM[/size][/b][/i][/u]


[size=5]Ever wished you could use the Unrelenting Force shout as a normal spell?
Well wish no more as I have made it into a friendly spell!

Spell Description
User Focuses on the three words Fus Ro Dah, and their translation of meaning, Force Balance Push, and concentrates it through the palm, causing devastation to whom may cross it.

You can locate the Spell Tome, in the High Hrothgar Meeting Room.[/size]
author: Enoomnai
